description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              We are seeking a productive in-house Designer who will be responsible for design, production and execution of still and graphical elements for different media platforms, ranging from print (catalogue, leaflet, brochure, standee,...), presentation, below-the-line marketing collaterals, to digital asset.
              
              You may need to manage more than one design brief at a time and typical activities include:
              
              - Conceptualise and design high-quality print, digital, that aligns with business and marketing objectives
              
              - Create new and original designs from scratch based on corporate and project specification, needs and brand image
              
              - Collaborate with teams to translate complicated information and data into clear, effective charts, graphs and compelling visuals and stories
              
              - Liaising with Marketing team/ other teams to determine the requirements
              
              - Estimating the time required to complete the work
              
              - Developing design briefs that suit the requirements purpose
              
              - Working as part of the Marketing team, with other designers and marketing specialists
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Adaptive design eye and skill
              
              - Passion and enthusiasm for design, with a creative flair
              
              - Knowledge in current trends in graphic design and an understanding in different social media channels
              
              - Must have good knowledge of color theory, layout design, photo editing, creativity, flexibility, attention to detail, deadline-oriented
              
              - Proficiency in design applications including Adobe Creative Suite, Sketchup. Good plus if you know or have knowledge about design website, basic HTML and CSS
              
              - Take the initiative and proactive in work
              
              - Middle-upper level in English
              
              - More than 2 years experience
              

              *** Please include a link to your online portfolio in your resume.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
